700546f-a.title: Bronx: Boston Road - Waring Avenue
700546f-a.text:
Boston Road, east side, south from Waring Avenue to White Plains
Road. On the latter is the elevated structure of the I.R.T. subway.
April 3, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
700546f-a.folder: Boston Road & Waring Avenue, Bronx, NY
